name: Fantasy Lands
description:
A single player strategy game in the style of euro board games where each game lasts around 30 minutes.

To Win A Game You Need to Earn Renown.
  • One way is using your workers to activate map hexagons to collect resources and draw cards. Play cards to improve lands and create quests. Recruit adventurers and use them to complete quests, which will grant renown.
  • Another way is to use recruited adventurers to explore lands and defeat monsters. 4 boss monsters per map can be found in the farthest locations, they provide the highest rewards upon defeating them.
  • At player level 6 spells are also available.

Winning a game raises your player level. This unlocks new land and quest cards, player races, adventurer classes, spells and monsters. It also increases the challenge of further games.

For each game element that becomes unlocked a tutorial is available in-game to learn its use.
